Posts.EditableText:
There's not a lot of documentation on creation and editing of the editor pieces.  But I wondered, is there a way to add some text formatting to the labels and captions in the tabs?

I tried < b> and it got mad at me because it was html nested inside html.

Then I tried ** around my text since it was offered here for the forum, and that just printed it was typed.

If there are ways we can bold, italicise, increase font, etc.  I'd be grateful to know about it.
Posts.HTML:
There's not a lot of documentation on creation and editing of the editor pieces. But I wondered, is there a way to add some text formatting to the labels and captions in the tabs?

I tried < b> and it got mad at me because it was html nested inside html.

Then I tried ** around my text since it was offered here for the forum, and that just printed it was typed.

If there are ways we can bold, italicise, increase font, etc. I'd be grateful to know about it.
